Record.ClassificationPath: EO_Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Experimental Organism Diagnosis/Mouse Pathologic Diagnoses/Mouse Cancer-Related Conditions/Mouse Noncancerous Conditions/Non-Neoplastic Hematopoietic Disorders of Mouse/Non-Neoplastic Non-Lymphoid Hematopoietic Disorders of Mouse/Non-Neoplastic Histiocytic Disorders of Mouse/Sinus Histiocytosis of Mouse
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Lymphatic Diseases/Histiocytosis/Histiocytosis, Non-Langerhans-Cell/Histiocytosis, Sinus
Record.BroaderTerm: Non-Neoplastic Non-Lymphoid Hematopoietic Disorders of Mouse
Record.Description: Benign, non-Langerhans-cell, histiocytic proliferative disorder that primarily affects the lymph nodes. It is often referred to as sinus histiocytosis with massive lymphadenopathy.
